desc: Amor Blooms believes in curating the finest fresh, dried and preserved flowers. Our goal is to provide quality arrangements that will delight our customers in every occasion and event. With our love for the environment, we plant a tree for every purchase made.

layout.text: Amor Blooms believes in curating the finest fresh, dried and preserved flowers.
Our goal is to provide quality arrangements that will delight our customers on every occasion and event.
